name: mptrcl
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wn(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls)))
-| wi(wn(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls)), wcel(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wn(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wn(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wn(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls)), wcel(c2, c3))

stmt.origin: nsyl4(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wss(cdm(c1), c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
-| wss(cdm(c1), c3)

body.origin:
|- wss(cdm(c1), c3)
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
-| diffsc(s0, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
-| diffsc(s0, c3)

|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
-| diffsc(s0, c3)

comment: Reverse closure for a mapping: If the function value of a mapping has a member, the argument belongs to the base class of the mapping. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)
